name: Benson
headline: Easily invest like the rich
description: Benson helps everyday people invest like the rich by helping them identify the best stocks to invest in. We help users know when to buy, how much to invest, and even when to sell.

founders.name: Phillip Aubrey, Founder/President
founders.description: Phillip (CEO) is a Venture Capitalist & Private Equity investor turned entrepreneur. He started his career as a quantitative private equity investor at Landmark Partners. He then transitioned into early stage venture investing at Initialized Capital, where he invested & directly supported over 70 pre-seed/seed stage companies. As the only junior investor on the team Phillip worked directly with the General Partners on all matters around diligence, investing, & on-going support.

## Common Questions
How does the app work?
Benson links to your brokerage account, analyzes your portfolio, and automates investments by making weekly trades and suggesting stocks – all with minimal input from you.
How does the investing part work with Benson?
Once you’ve connected your brokerage account, Benson helps you figure out which stocks to buy and sell. Once you approve, Benson executes the trades within your brokerage account.
When can I expect the ‘Stocks of the Month’ list?
Every Monday at 9am PST, Benson delivers three handpicked stocks specially selected for you.
Do I have control over how much and how often I invest?
Absolutely! You set your budget and choose which stocks to add to your portfolio. Benson automatically reinvests in your existing winners and suggests new stocks monthly, but you're always in control of expanding your portfolio.

Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W22, Benson is a forward-thinking startup located in the vibrant Oakland, California. With a small but dedicated team of three, led by Group Partner Michael Seibel, Benson’s mission is clear: to help everyday people invest like the wealthy.

**What Does Benson Do?**

The core idea behind Benson is simplicity—a no-nonsense approach to investing. It helps users identify the top stocks to invest in and provides guidance on when to buy, how much to invest, and when to sell. No more guesswork. Users can feel empowered every step of the way.

The Benson app does the heavy lifting by analyzing markets while users live their lives. Imagine having an investment team in your pocket—Benson delivers a curated list of the top 10 stocks to consider each month. You set your budget—anywhere from $5 to $500 a week—and pick the stocks that resonate most with you. Benson automates the trades, allowing you to focus on other aspects of life while your investments are monitored and adjusted.

**Key Features:**

- **Personalized Investment Recommendations:** Each week, receive three hand-picked stocks based on market performance.
- **Budget Control:** You’re always in charge of how much you want to invest and where you’d like to allocate your funds.
- **Stress-Free Management:** Benson watches and manages your portfolio, allowing for automatic reinvestment in your best-performing stocks.
- **User-Friendly Interface:** The app is designed for ease of use, ensuring that even those new to investing feel comfortable navigating it.

**User Testimonials:**

Feedback from users highlights the practicality and effectiveness of the app:
- "By far the easiest investing app I’ve used," says Ava G., a satisfied 27-year-old Benson user.
- "Benson manages my portfolio, and I haven’t missed an opportunity in months!" shares Sarah L., who appreciates the peace of mind it provides.

**Get Started with Benson**

Curious? You can explore more and download the app at [Benson’s website](https://www.meetbenson.com). Whether you're a newbie or looking to streamline your investing strategy, Benson aims to democratize investing, making it as easy as it should be.

Invest smartly, build wealth, and let the experts at Benson guide you. It's time to invest like the rich!
